preqs: Students must have passed 48 points including at least 12 points from the Department of Marketing.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: This unit is designed to expose students to the thinking of some of the world's leading marketers. Building on previous knowledge gained in earlier marketing units students will analyse the critical factors associated with marketing in a global arena. Students gain a practical understanding of these issues in a global context through the visitation program which forms an integral part of this unit.
